contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 14th day of December, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether the statute of limitations set forth at 42 Pa.C.S. § 5529 constitutes a defense in a proceeding to revive and continue the lien of a judgment?
It is further ordered that the appeal will be considered on the briefs.
